entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
